column1: carol a. nagel| a former figure skater
column3: passed away peacefully at buffalo general hospital
column4: with her family at her side
column5: at the age of 72. she was the beloved wife of the late richard c. nagel and devoted mother of charlene (michael) schrenk. carol was predeceased by four sisters and survived by nieces
column7: cousins and many friends and her grand dogs sadie and holly. family will be present on friday from 5-8 pm at the pietszak funeral home
column8: 2400 william st. (near harlem) where funeral services will be celebrated on saturday at 10 am. pastor bill lowery and tony fisher
column9: of the ransomville free methodist church
column10: will be officiating. entombment will follow at st. matthew's cemetery
